column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////In the world of prime steak
column2: it's getting hard to stand out.  There are just so many great steakhouses competing for top dog
column3: so when you see a place listed pretty much on the top of the "lists" that exist
column4: it's hard for it to blow you away compared to other great steakhouses you've been to.  There were 5 star items and 3 star items
column5: so somewhere around 4 stars is about right.
